name: banking-scheme-guidance-system
description: A rule-based banking scheme guidance system with neon-themed UI

scripts.test:single: node -e "console.log('Running single endpoint test...'); const http = require('http'); http.get('http://localhost:5000/api/health', (res) => { let data = ''; res.on('data', chunk => data += chunk); res.on('end', () => console.log('Health:', JSON.parse(data))); });"
scripts.validate:json: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); try { JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./server/data/bank_schemes.json')); console.log('✓ JSON is valid'); } catch(e) { console.error('✗ JSON error:', e.message); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.lint:schemes: node -e "const schemes = require('./server/data/bank_schemes.json'); console.log('Total schemes:', schemes.schemes.length); const banks = [...new Set(schemes.schemes.map(s => s.bank_name))]; console.log('Banks:', banks.join(', ')); const cats = [...new Set(schemes.schemes.map(s => s.scheme_category))]; console.log('Categories:', cats.join(', '));"
scripts.filter:example: curl -X POST http://localhost:5000/api/filter -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"age":28,"income":600000,"purpose":"Home Loans","limit":3}' | jq .
